description:
Set in the arid barren, languid and punishing realm of the desert. Surgeon Scofflaw now reigns as the desert Dom. Equipped with her new errand boy on her arm, together they search for resources and new playthings in the desert.

Everyone plays nice until Surgeon notices the unbearable attraction between her boy and their new newfound instrument. Poor billy gets punished, put into suspension bondage, and whipped. During this whirlwind a luscious and alluring intruder is discovered Sophia St. James.

Watch the cyclical and ever shifting sensual power play unfold between these four post apocalyptic desert women. Fisted, fucked, kissed, spanked, whipped and hit, all under the unwavering heat of the desert sun in the post apocalyptic new world.
title: The Return of Post Apocalyptic Cow Girls
